mapper.sql: STGId, Year, Place, SmCode, SmName, STGdp
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_subtravelgdp where year=#{0} and place=#{1}
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_subtravelgdp
STGId,
Year,
Place,
SmCode,
SmName,
STGdp,
#{stgid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{smcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{smname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{stgdp,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
mapper.update:
update tbl_subtravelgdp
Year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SmCode = #{smcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SmName = #{smname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STGdp = #{stgdp,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where STGId = #{stgid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tbl_subtravelgdp set Year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SmCode = #{smcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SmName = #{smname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STGdp = #{stgdp,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where STGId = #{stgid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
